body_html: I too don't have a strong preference for NegatedArguments vs before_call. I figured it could be something of general use, but if it's really only used here then it may be overkill. Your call, really.

body: I too don't have a strong preference for `NegatedArguments` vs `before_call`. I figured it could be something of general use, but if it's really only used here then it may be overkill. Your call, really.
